description: Starting implementation of reader, compute, and writer kernels
Running initial tests with minimal shape first
Program descriptor uses ttnn.DataFormat.Float16_b which does not exist. CBFormatDescriptor expects DataType enum like ttnn.bfloat16 or ttnn.float32
evidence: AttributeError: module ttnn has no attribute DataFormat

description: Both bf16 and f32 minimal tests passed
Float32 scaler generation likely wrong. generate_reduce_scaler fills row0 with packed bf16 values but float32 requires different tile format. For float32, each position is 32 bits, not 16.
evidence: All bf16 tests pass, f32 fails with PCC=0.69 and max_diff=951

description: All 29 tests passed: 22 correctness (11 bf16 + 11 f32), 2 minimal, 4 validation, 1 edge case
